data.eml:eml: Description of Malenchus gilanensis n. sp. from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jalalinasab, Parisa, Adeldoost, Yaser, Abolafia, Joaquín, Heydari, Ramin (2019): Description of Malenchus gilanensis n. sp. from Iran. Zootaxa 4638 (4): 562-570, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4638.4.6
